constraints.name: prime_factors_sum
constraints.description: 对于每个类型 2 的操作，输出区间 [l, r] 内所有数的最小质因数和。
constraints.formal: For each type 2 operation, output the minimum possible sum of the prime factors of the numbers a_l, a_{l+1}, ..., a_r.

constraints.name: operation_sequence
constraints.formal: Operations are performed in the order they are given.

constraints.name: valid_operation_types
constraints.description: 操作类型 t 必须是 1、2 或 3。

constraints.name: valid_indices
constraints.description: 对于类型 1 的操作，i 必须在 [1, n] 范围内；对于类型 2 和类型 3 的操作，l 和 r 必须在 [1, n] 范围内且 l ≤ r。
constraints.formal: For t=1: 1 ≤ i ≤ n; For t=2 and t=3: 1 ≤ l ≤ r ≤ n

constraints.name: valid_x_value
constraints.description: 对于类型 3 的操作，x 必须在 [1, 10^4] 范围内。
